org.wildfly.swarm.config.management.access

Class SizeRotatingFileHandler<T extends SizeRotatingFileHandler<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.config.management.access.SizeRotatingFileHandler<T>

  • public class SizeRotatingFileHandler<T extends SizeRotatingFileHandler<T>>
extends Object
    A management audit log handler which writes to a file, rotating the log after the size of the file grows beyond a certain point and keeping a fixed number of backups.
